rows.label: tlk001201_05_msg0001
rows.name:
I have done you all a great disservice.
Please allow me to offer my apologies...

rows.label: tlk001201_05_msg0002
rows.name:
The archives state that the third sword,
the one which draws out the power of the Heaven's Holy Grail,
is sealed somewhere in the Liberalitas Archipelago.

rows.label: tlk001201_05_msg0003
rows.name:
The power of the Heaven's Holy Grail...
I entrust it to you.

rows.label: tlk001201_05_msg0004
rows.name:
Zeke. I am entrusting you with the duty of
guarding the Heaven's Holy Grail and the boy.

rows.label: tlk001201_05_msg0005
rows.name:
I chose to believe in that boy's eyes.
We cannot allow that light to be extinguished.

rows.label: tlk001201_05_msg0006
rows.name: You can leave it to the one and only mighty Zeke!

rows.label: tlk001201_05_msg0007
rows.name:
It is because you make jokes like that
that you still have much to learn.
